their business through this continual storm.

14277.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x
description: {gYou are walking along the dense forests that lie within this city.
Rain barely makes it through the tree cover, and still reaches you.
You can hear sounds of wildlife all around you.  {x

14363.name: Bottom of a Steep Ledge
description: You stand at the base of a very steep mithril ledge.  Water runs
down this ledge, creating a beautiful sight.  The sound of a far away
storm can be heard from above.

14021.name: Eastern Main Street
description: The street reaches east and west, and nears it's end to the eastern side.
The cobblestones beneath your feet are each exact, showing the great
patience of the creator.  The clouds overhead warn of the coming storm, as
it has already begun.  The wind blows through the streets, picking up dust
and rustling hair.

14129.name: Alleyway
description: The buildings on your sides begin to grow closer together, as the city
becomes more dense.  The rain is falling steadily, giving the green stone
walls a certain glimmer.  A few doors are on the adjacent buildings.

14372.name: The Descent to Darrowmere
description: You have almost reached the bottom of this massive valley.  Rain
falls around you, and a few strikes of lightning cause you to jump.
The city ahead seems almost to big to be real, as you get very
overwhelmed.

14115.name: Cityguard Headquarters
description: Here lies the main hall of the headquarters.  Masses of guards stand
around, talking about assignments and trouble on the streets.  A large desk
lies against the southern wall, and an important looking guard sits at it.
Lamps on the walls give light off in the room, creating a few shadows in the
corners.

14050.name: Western Main Street
description: The street nears it's western end, as it reaches the west wall.  Some
street lamps line the road, flickering around in the breeze.  Large
buildings can be seen to the northeast, probably ones of mass importance.

14061.name: Along the Southern Wall
description: You walk along the east west southern wall road.  To the direct
west you can see the southwest guard tower.  More to the east the
southern gates can be seen.  The city expands before you to the
northeast, and seems to be constantly growing.

14026.name: Along the Eastern Wall
description: You are walking along the eastern wall road, which runs north and
south.  This is the easternmost place in Darrowmere, and the outside
wilderness lies just beyond this wall.  The rain falls steadily around
you, with no signs of stopping.

14261.name: Bedroom
description: You stand in a medium sized room, with furniture suitable for
living.  The air is slightly warmer here than the hallway outside.  A
window to the south shows the rain pouring down outside.

14358.name: Mithril Caves
description: You decend deeper into the mithril caves, that sink into the
surface.  Soft gusts of wind can still be felt, although they are not
very strong.  Dripping water can be heard from a distance.

14025.name: Along the Eastern Wall
description: You walk along the eastern wall road, which parallels the road
perfectly.  To the north and south ends of this road lie guard towers,
and to the east lies the rest of the city.  A very tall building lies
to your direct west, with a beautiful garden surrounding it.

14123.name: Alleyway
description: This alleyway stretches westward into darker parts of the city.  It is
much darker here than the main street, and who know what may lurk in that
darkness.  The wind continues to whine through the alley, and rain comes
down around you.

14087.name: Entrance Hall
description: The path ends, and leads into a large entrance hall.  It is the beginning
of the great Imperial Palace, the chief building to the great Emperor.  This
building marks the center of the Emperor's realms.  The hallways of this
structure seem to be made from the finest jade, floors covered in the
greatest rugs in the lands.  This truly is the pinnacle of the Emperor's
greatest accomplishments.

14333.name: The Hoagie Emporium
description: You stand in a well-lit room, with windows facing the alley.  Music
plays loudly, and some people dance in the center of the room.  The
predominant colors of this room and red, white, and green.  There is a
large counter to the east, and a small kitchen behind it.

14084.name: Common Square
description: The southeast common square lies here, with it's compliments of shops and
buildings.  The stone path leads around the square, bringing everyone to
shop after shop.  The wind picks up a bit of dirt around your feet.

14210.name: Southern Wall of Guild Square
description: You are walking along the southernmost wall of the guild square.
Fellow adventurers walk around here, practicing their skills and
gaining experience in battle.

14047.name: Along the Western Wall
description: This road follows the western wall, which runs just north and
south.  South of here the western gates can be seen, and north the
northwestern guard tower can barely be made out.  The rain is still
falling around you, crashing softly to the ground.

14263.name: Bedroom
description: You have entered a small bedroom, with only a bed and a chest of
drawers.  You can hear the sounds of the outside storm, and the window
to the south shows how hard the rain is coming down.

14393.name: Small Room Atop the Wall
description: You stand in a very small room, which is somehow very well hidden
from sight on the wall.  It is poorly lit in here, and there are very
modest furnishings.

14257.name: Hallway in the Mansion
description: You are walking down the main hallway in this mansion.  Doors line
the walls, with lanterns between each set of doors, creating adequate
light.  You can hear the sounds of a storm coming from outside.

14251.name: Hallway in the Mansion
description: You are walking down the main hallway in this mansion.  It comes to
an abrupt end here, and you're faced with three walls before you.  You
can hear the sounds of the raging storm coming from outside of this
mansion.

14011.name: Main Street
description: The street continues, leading further away from the city center.
Eastward lies a large palace.  The bustling city traffic can be heard all
around you, leading off in all directions.

14074.name: Along the Eastern Wall
description: You are walking along the eastern wall road, which follows the
eastern wall very closely.  Here you can hear the sounds of both the
city and the wilderness, each contrasting one another.  The rain falls
continually around you, and flashes of lightning ignite the sky.

14207.name: Western Wall of Guild Square
description: You walk down the western wall of guild square.  Here others fight
monsters, and grow stronger with their skills.  You can hear sounds of
the storm coming from above ground.

14052.name: Western Main Street
description: The road leads farther west, toward the western wall.  The street is made
of identical cobblestones, each one the same in every way.  Whoever built
these surely had extreme patience and an iron will.  Back east lies the city
center.

14233.name: The Altar
description: You stand before a huge altar, which is at the easternmost section
of this church.  Beautiful tapestries cover the walls, and a few
stained glass windows allow light in behind the altar.  The music is
fainter here, as you must have walked away from the source.

14242.name: Third Floor of the Church
description: You are walking along the third floor of this huge church.  The
music grows around you, as well as the sound of the outside storm.
There is a small spiral staircase leading up, probably to the highest
floor of this church.

14169.name: Hallway
description: You stand in a small, narrow hallway that reaches away from the
stockyards.  Farther to the south lies a large door, which could be
almost anything.  The sound of machinery grows distant here, as you
walk farther away from the stockyards.

14042.name: Northwest Corner of the Wall
description: You have reached the northwest corner of the city.  A large guard
tower sits atop this corner.  You can hear the sounds of the city, and
outside the walls the sounds of wilderness can be heard.

14406.name: Spiral Staircase, Down
description: You begin to walk down a huge spiral staircase, and spins and winds
down to complete blackness.  A slight wind howls around you, and the
air gets slightly colder.  Dripping water can be heard all around, and
you begin to wonder how far down this case goes.

14198.name: Bank of Darrowmere
description: You stand in a large room, with stone walls and a stone floor.
There are lamps on the walls, and a large lamp hanging from the
ceiling.  Tapestries hang from the walls, and there is a large counter
sitting before the western wall.  A large safe door can be seen behind
the counter.

14143.name: SouthWestern Guard Tower
description: You stand in a large guard tower, which watches and protects the
city from the southwest.  There is a stone railing around this tower,
with an open roof.  The rain pours down around you, creating a few
puddles around your feet.

14000.name: Before the Gates of Darrowmere
description: You stand before the massive gates which lead into Darrowmere.
Rain falls down all around you, and looking farther away the valley
walls tower above you.  The city spans all your view to the north, and
back south lies the forest path.

14078.name: Along the Southern Wall
description: You are walking along the southern wall road.  To the direct north
some buildings line the road, and further north lies the rest of the
city.  The rain has not let up at all since your arrival here, and the
rumble of thunder tells of a storm that is heading this way.

14051.name: Western Main Street
description: The street leads east and west, practically cutting the city into halves.
The cobblestones beneath your feet cover the entire road.  Off in the
distance a large building can be seen.  It's almost rectangular, but gets
pyramidical towards the top.

14371.name: The Descent to Darrowmere
description: This valley path leads steeply down toward the valley floor.  You
get a strong feeling of insignificance as you stare around you at this
valley.  The city in this valley's center seems to be ever-growing as
you near it.

14330.name: Stone-Walled Warehouse
description: You have reached the end of this warehouse.  There are piles of
boxes and crates all around you, and you begin to wonder what they are
for.  Voices can be heard all around you, and the sounds of the
outside storm can be heard as well.

14253.name: Hallway in the Mansion
description: You are walking down the main hallway in the second floor of this
mansion.  You can hear the roar of the rain from outside, as the storm
rages on.

14276.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x
description: {gYou walk along some very dense forests within this city.  The
treetops almost cover you completely from the rain, but a few drops
make it through.  You can hear noises of wildlife around you, along
with rumbles of thunder from overhead.  {x

14205.name: Western Wall of Guild Square
description: You walk along the westernmost side of the guild square.  This
entire square looks like a good place to fight, practice your skills,
and gain some experience.  Buildings line all sides of this square.

14158.name: Narrow Alleyway
description: You are walking down a very narrow alley, which tears into the
dense city of Darrowmere.  The sound of trade can be heard, as the
cityfolk bustle about their business.  The sound of the overhead storm
can also be heard, as a soft crash of thunder reminds you of it.  A
sign points to the north that reads '{gArmory{x'.

14359.name: Mithril Caves
description: You continue to walk inside the vast mithril caves.  These caves
sink deep into the planet's surface, and lead toward unknown
territory.  The walls here are green, and made completely of stone.

14296.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x
description: {8You walk inside the basement that lies below the mansion.
Footsteps can be heard all around you, and you wonder what they could
be from.  Dripping water can be heard, which is most likely a
by-product of the storm above ground.  {x

14328.name: The Daemon's Claw
description: You stand in a fairly large room, that is not very well lit.  There
are a few lanterns, which provide just enough light to see around the
room.  There are weapons hanging on the walls, and a large counter to
the west.

14054.name: Main Street
description: You walk along the main street, which runs east and west.  Buildings line
the road, with people bustling in and out.  The brick street continues east
and west.

14273.name: Cell
description: You stand in a very small jail cell, which serves as a place to
hold prisoners of this city.  It has a metal bed hanging from the
wall, and a sink and toilet.  A small window of bars is on the western
wall.

14136.name: Sewers of Darrowmere
description: You stand in the deep, dark Sewers of Darrowmere.  Here the law
cannot reach, nor can the light.  All around you the sound of dripping
water can be heard as the city above gets rained upon.  Slight shadows
are cast about the room, from the faint light that allows you to see
around.

14187.name: Hallway
description: You have turned a corner in this hallway, to find yet more hallway.
There is a door to the south, which leads to some unknown room.  There
are voices coming from the east and south.

14395.name: Sewers of Darrowmere
description: You are walking in the large sewers that lie below Darrowmere.
There is no way out, and this is the last place you are going to see.

14122.name: {2The {@Burn{2t {@Engli{2sh {@Muf{2fin{x
description: You stand in a large room, with a low ceiling.  The walls are made of
some kind of dark wood, and the floor is carpeted.  A small bar lies in the
corner, and some couches are pushed up against the walls.  A soft hint of
jazz music radiates from somewhere within the room, creating a soft
atmosphere.  Rows of glasses hang above the bar, and some stools sit around
it.  This looks like a place where you can kick back and rest.

14321.name: Dimly lit Alley
description: You walk down a very narrow alley, which leads to a dense section
of the city.  There are no lights down this alley, as the only light
comes from the rest of the city.

14192.name: {GG{greenston{Ge {8Inn, Tavern{x
description: You have entered a large, well lit room.  There are tables and a
large bar here, along with many tired travellers who need a break.
Music plays softly in the background over the roar of the rain
outside.

14109.name: Stairwell
description: The stairwell reaches up to the fifth floor.  This palace is literally
gigantic.  The grey slate stairs climb their way to the next floor, and the
banister following all the way.

14259.name: Guest Quarters
description: You have entered a large bedroom, where guests to this mansion can
stay.  There is a bed and a chest of drawers here, along with a huge
rug covering the floor.  A window to the east has rain streaking down
it.

14041.name: Along the Northern Wall
description: The wall road continues east and west, and it appears that you are
nearing the northwest corner to the west.  The sounds of the city fill
the air, as the dense part of the city is directly to your south.

14387.name: {8Shadow Guild{x Summoning Room
description: You stand in a small room, with a glowing red circle set in the
center of the floor.  There are tomes and scrolls on a small table to
the west.  This seems to be where the {8Shadow Guild{x mages bring their
comrades in.

14157.name: Narrow Alleyway
description: You stand at a sharp bend in the alley.  Tall buildings line the
streets, and each one has a few lanterns hanging on it, to light your
way.  The rain pours down, and creates a thin coating over the green
stone of the buildings.

14137.name: {GJ{gade Hallwa{Gy{x
description: You are walking down a large hallway, which leads south to the main
hallway, and north to some large room.  The lights here reflect off
the jade walls, creating a beautiful look.

14315.name: Pathway to a Large Building
description: You are walking down a narrow pathway that leads to a very large
building.  Windows cover the walls of that building, and the rain
coming down covers those windows entirely.  It is much greener here
than the rest of the slums.

14354.name: Training Rooms
description: You have entered a large room where the Psionics train their
spells.  There are targets for spells on the walls, and the strong
sense of magic is felt here.  The only exits are north and east.

14292.name: Base of the Spiral Staircase
description: You have reached the bottom of this very tall staircase.  The room
you stand in is very dark, and musty.  To the east lies the basement
of this mansion, and all the horrors it contains.

14176.name: Main hall of the {8Shadow Guild{x
description: You stand in a large meeting room, where members of the {8Shadow
Guild{x meet and converse together.  This building itself is very large,
which suggests many more rooms.  Back south lies the entranceway, and
all around you lie possible exits.

14394.name: Sewers of Darrowmere
description: You walk down a large pipeline, which leads deeper and deeper into
the complex sewer system below Darrowmere.  You hear footsteps around
you and wonder what could be making them.

14249.name: Hallway in the Mansion
description: You are walking down the main hallway in this mansion.  Paintings
cover the walls, along with tapestries and lanterns.  Some huge lights
also hang from the ceiling, making this hallway very well lit.

14178.name: Hallway in the {8Shadow Guild{x
description: You walk down a fairly wide hallway, which reaches deeper in the
heart of the {8Shadow Guild{x.  There are emblems of the guild on the
walls, and a beautofully woven carpet on top of the stone floor.
There are lanterns on the walls, which guides your way.

14314.name: The Dungeon
description: You have entered a large dungeon.  There are wooden beds with
chains attached to them everywhere, along with various tools hanging
on the walls.  The room is poorly lit with a few fire lanterns on the
walls.

14194.name: Well Lit Alleyway
description: You walk down a very well lit alley, with lanterns on the walls of
the nearby buildings.  There are a few doors, but most of them seem
inaccessible.  The rain falls down around you, creating puddles at
your feet.

14179.name: Hallway in the {8Shadow Guild{x
description: You walk down a fairly narrow hallway, which reaches into the
center of the {8Shadow Guild{x.  The sound of voices can be heard, along
with the clatter of footsteps.  Back west lies the exit out of here.

14147.name: Narrow Alleyway
description: You walk along a very narrow alleyway, which leads into a dense
section of the city.  Some laterns hang outside doors along this
alley, but most of those doors look to be locked.  The alley continues
on into the city, leading to other buildings and shops.

14267.name: Hallway
description: You are walking down the main hallway of the third floor.  Doors
line the walls, along with lanterns that guide your path.  A
beautifully woven rug covers the floor, and follows the hallway to its
end.

14275.name: Cell
description: You have entered a large jail cell, which must be the main one of
this building.  There are a few metal cots on the walls, and a sink
and toilet.  There is a small barred window facing east, revealing a
damp, yet beautiful garden.

14212.name: Southeast Corner of Guild Square
description: You have reached the southeastern corner of the guild square.  Here
other travellers battle monsters and practice their skills.  The floor
here is splattered with a bit of blood.

14010.name: Main Street
description: You walk along a wide street, consisting mostly of a fine stone.  The
wind blows through your hair along with a soft touch of rain.  To the
northeast lies a giant building, and northward the city limits can be seen.

14028.name: Along the Eastern Wall
description: This road follows the eastern wall very closely.  To the west the
city seems to be ever expanding before you, as if it were constantly
growing.  The rain still falls around you, soaking your clothes and
creating puddles at your feet.

14103.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x
description: The hall continues, leading to the rest of the palace.  The great walls
depict the great worksmanship of the builder through their intricate design.
Some side hallways and doors lead into other parts of the building.

14209.name: Southern Wall of Guild Square
description: You are walking along the southern wall of the guild square.  Here
you can practice your skills, and gain experience in fighting.  Others
walk around here, battling with the roaming monsters.

14340.name: Hallway
description: You walk down a large hallway, which leads to another stairwell.
There is a beautiful rug covering the floor, and expensive paintings
line the walls.  You can hear the storm raging on outside.

14090.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Temple{x
description: The Temple continues here, with pillars on either side.  The temple seems
to start to open up, as if leading into a larger area.  The soft chant of
healers and trickle of water fills the air.  Back south lies the entrance to
the temple, and north lies the altar.

14398.name: Entranceway
description: You stand in a dark entranceway, which leads to who knows what.
Music and voices can be heard nearby, and you wonder what is going on.
There certainly weren't any signs telling you about this place.

14188.name: {8Shadow Guild{x Training Room
description: You have entered a large training room in the guild.  Here the
various members of the guild can hone their fighting skills.  The only
apparent exit is back north through the door.

14378.name: Forest Pathway
description: You are walking down a very narrow pathway which leads to the
massive city of Darrowmere.  Looking around you, the valley walls
tower up into the sky, and you begin to wonder how you made it down
those walls in the first place.

14213.name: Eastern Wall of Guild Square
description: You are walking along the easternmost wall in the guild square.
Other adventurers walk around here, practicing their skills and
gaining experience in battle.

14030.name: Along the Northern Wall
description: You are walking along the northernmost road in Darrowmere.  The
northern wall is right along this road, and is at least three feet
thick.  The sounds of trade can be heard from the rest of the city,
and the sound of a growing storm can be heard directly above you.

14195.name: Well Lit Alleyway
description: You are walking down a very well lit alleyway.  There are lanterns
mounted on each side of the street, along with a few street lamps
coming up from the ground.  The splatter of rain is heard all around
you, as the storm overhead rages on.

14191.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Inn{x
description: You have entered the famous Greenstone Inn through a doorway from
the Temple.  Here weary travellers can stay and rest, or just hang
around and chat together.  There is a peaceful atmosphere here, and
the air is calm and dry, as opposed to the outside.  A healing pool
sits in the center of the room, and an old healer wanders around.

14092.name: Large Residence
description: You have entered a large residence, that sits below the rest of the
city.  Buildings on all sides tower over this, and the rain from above
patterns on the roof.  Back south lies the exit.

14300.name: {MCavern of the {RInfernal Genesis{x
description: {8You have reached the very end of the basement here, and realize
that you should not have explored this far.  This cavern is extremely
large, and you wonder if you'll be able to get back out, after the
drop to get in here.  Stalagmites cover the cavern, and a cold chill
runs through here.  {x

14208.name: Southwest Corner of Guild Square
description: You stand in the southwestern corner of the guild square.  Here you
and for fellow travellers can hone your skills and gain experience.
The sounds of fighting can be heard from the rest of the square.

14260.name: Bedroom
description: You have entered a medium sized bedroom, with modest furniture
suitable for a guest to this mansion.  A lantern lights this room, and
a window to the north shows the storm outside.

14046.name: Along the Western Wall
description: You are following the western wall road, which closely parallels
the western wall of Darrowmere.  To the south the western gates lie,
and up north farther the northwestern guard tower can be seen.

14035.name: Along the Northern Wall
description: You are walking along the northernmost road in Darrowmere.  Just
west of here lies the northern gate, and far to the east lies the
northeastern guard tower.  The sound of rain pattering at your feet
can be heard slightly over the road of bustling people in the city.

14017.name: Main Street
description: The street reaches east and west, leading to more of this large city.  A
rather large building can be seen to the north, and an ever bigger one north
of that.  The cobblestone street looks absolutely perfect; each stone
disturbingly exact.

14107.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x
description: The hallway leads to more of the fourth floor.  Along with it follows the
beautiful jade walls and ceiling, and also the woven rug-covered floor.  The
light in the room bounces from wall to wall, making it astoundingly
beautiful.

14186.name: Hallway
description: You are walking down a large hallway in the guild.  Many members of
the guild watch you as you intrude on their territory.  The sound of
the rain falling outside can be heard faintly.

14133.name: Upstairs Loft
description: You stand in a room above the Pub.  There are a few living commodities
about the room, and an oil lamp sits on a table.  A large woven rug covers
the floor, except where the stairway juts out of it.  A small window is on
the northern wall, revealing the dense part of Darrowmere.  Streaks of rain
run down the window, making it slightly difficult to see detail out of it.

14201.name: Guild Square
description: You are walking through the guild square, which houses all the
guilds in which to practice and train.  These parts of the square seem
to be a place to fight and hone your skills, as there are some weak
looking monsters around here.

14064.name: Along the Western Wall
description: You are travelling along the north south western wall road.  At
either end lies a guard tower, and directly to the north lie the
western gates.  Buildings line the eastern side of this road, and the
wall is to the west.

14244.name: Fourth Floor of the Church
description: You have reached the end of the fourth floor of this church.  The
music is even louder now, and seems to be coming from directly above.
There is a spiral staircase leading up to what must be the very top of
this church.

14111.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x
description: The hallway stretches down to the west, leading to some more rooms.  The
walls are made of pure jade, a sign of how detailed and perfect the builder
wanted this place to be.  A large woven rug travels down the hallway along
with you.

14397.name: Catch of the Day
description: You stand in a small room, that is slightly chilled and smells of
fresh fish.  This is where the fisherman sell their catch, which has
been imported from the famous Sea of Swords.

14388.name: Room of the Questmaster
description: You stand in a large room, with a large chair above the floor.
Some windows line the walls, showing the outside storm, and a huge rug
coveres the center of the floor.  A sign is on the wall, with the
heading: {GQuest{x.   The only exit is back down.
Notice:  This Questmaster is only for purchasing quest items... to receive actual quests, visit one of the many shopkeepers in town.

14338.name: Confession Room
description: You stand in a very small, dark room, with a screen down the middle
of it.  You can hear the faint sound of organ music coming from the
rest of the church.  There is a small bench for kneeling on the floor,
and the only exit is back east.

14285.name: Entrance to the Morgue
description: You stand before a large stone building, which houses Darrowmere's
dead.  Few windows are on the walls of this building, and the building
itself looks very sterile.

14144.name: NorthWestern Tower
description: You are standing in the northwestern tower of Darrowmere.  Here the
tower guards protect the city from any danger that may come from the
outside.  The rain falls from overhead, as there is no roof above you.
Puddles form around your feet.

14079.name: Along the Southern Wall
description: This road follows the southern wall, with a guard tower at either
end.  To the west lie the southern gates, and north the city expands
before your eyes.  One particular building stands out above the rest
of the city, which may show its importance.

14145.name: NorthEastern Tower
description: You stand in a large guard tower, which protects the city from the
outside wilderness.  The rain continues to fall from above, creating
many puddles around your feet.  The only exit is back down.

14033.name: Along the Northern Wall
description: This road goes east and west, which parallels the northern wall of
Darrowmere.  To the south a large building towers over the rest of the
city, and it looks to be very important.  The sound of rain falling,
along with an occasional thunder strike can be heard.

14162.name: Underground Stockyards
description: You walk inside a massive underground structure, which contains
hundreds of crates.  There are people walking around and going about
their business.  The screeching noise of metal against metal can be
heard some distance from here.

14309.name: Inside the Whore house
description: You have reached the end of this hallway, and there is yet another
door to the west.  People can be heard talking in these rooms,
although you can still hear the rain falling outside.

14032.name: Along the Northern Wall
description: You are walking along the northern wall road.  The wall itself is
made of a fine brick, and must be at least three feet thick.  It's
fairly high as well.  The sound of trade and bartering can be heard
coming from the rest of the city.

14015.name: Northern Gate
description: Here lie the northern gates, protecting the city from the perils of
the outside, and the outside from the perils of the city.  The wall
road runs east and west here, and the main road leading to the City
Center goes south.

14356.name: Entrance to the Mithril Caves
description: You stand at a large opening make completely of a fine natural
mithril.  The green stone walls of this cavern lead deep into the
surface of the planet, and stretch toward who knows what.

14298.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x
description: {8You continue to walk in this basement, stumbling around in the
blackness.  There are no lights on the walls, so only the light you
carry with you is guiding your path.  Sounds in this basement suggest
that you're not the only one down here.  {x

14038.name: Along the Northern Wall
description: This road follows the northern wall, which extends high above your
head.  Noise can be head from the south side, which contains the
poorer section of the city.  The rain still continues to fall here,
softly.

14230.name: Inside the Church
description: You are walking down the side aisle of this large church.  Rows of
pews line this aisle, and to the east lies a huge altar.  Stained
glass windows line the southern wall, making this place very
beautiful.

14383.name: Top Floor of the Imperial Palace
description: You have reached the top floor of this palace.  There are exits in
all directions, except up.  The staircase leads back down to the other
floors.

14384.name: {GJ{gade Hallwa{Gy{x
description: You walk down a very short hallway.  It leads to yet another spiral
staircase, which leads to the uppermost section of this palace.  Back
west lies the staircase down.

14073.name: Along the Eastern Wall
description: You walk along the north south eastern wall road.  To the west the
city expands before you, and to the east sounds of the wilderness can
be heard.  The rain continues to fall around you, and this city is in
The rain continues to fall around you, as this city is in a constant
state of storm.

14060.name: Along the Southern Wall
description: You stand on the southern wall road.  This road goes east and west,
with two large guard towers on either end.  Sounds of the city can be
heard, as the dense areas are just north of you.

14264.name: Bedroom
description: You stand in a small bedroom, with very little furniture.  There is
a beautifully woven rug on the floor, and a window to the west.  You
can hear the storm carry on outside this mansion.

14268.name: Bend in the Hallway
description: You have reached a sharp bend in this hallway, where it turns to
the east.  The rug also turns to the east, and follows the hall.
Lanterns line the walls, providing adequate light here for you to see.

14355.name: Training Rooms
description: You stand in a large room, where the Psionics train their spells
and skills.  There are multiple targets on the walls, and some various
wands and scrolls aside them.  The only exit is back south.

14086.name: The Mistress~

14087.name: The servant~
description: He is a young boy, running around doing errands for his highness.

14088.name: Belrak the Ranger~

14088.room_name: Belrak, the Minotaur Ranger is enjoying his new job.

14089.name: The old woman~
description: She has a bunch of bags, and seems to be on a shopping trip.

14089.room_name: An old woman walks around, doing her errands.

14090.name: The cat~
description: It seems to be very hungry, and without a home.
14090.room_name: A stray cat searches for food.

14091.name: The little biznitch~
description: She's a biznitch.  BIZNITCH!
subroutines:

14091.room_name: A little biznitch looks you up and down.

14092.name: The guard~
description: He's pretty big.
subroutines:

14092.room_name: A massive guard protects the riches here.

14093.name: The old woman~
description: She must have been playing these slots for a long time.
subroutines:

F par ABCDEFGHIJK
14093.room_name: An old woman sits here, playing the slots.

14095.room_name: An alley cat scrounges around in the rain.

14096.name: The fisherman~
description: He smells like fish.
subroutines:

F par ABCDEFGHIJK
14096.room_name: A fisherman stands here, offering the finest in fresh fish.

14097.name: The bartender~
description: He is fairly young.

14098.name: The nightclub dancer~

14100.room_name: The Chef stands here, cooking up today's meal.

14101.name: The Cityfolk~
description: This member of the cityfolk is a tall thin man, dressed in a raincoat.
14101.d_flags: D Says 'I hope they bury me someplace dry...'~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

14102.name: The protectorate guard~
description: He is pretty strong, and looks starved for doughnuts.

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
14102.t_flags: T Have you tried the baker's doughnuts yet?~
14102.room_name: A protectorate guard walks around, looking for doughnuts.

14103.name: A forest lizard~
description: It seems to be able to change it's color, therefore very stealthly.
14103.room_name: {gA forest {8lizard{g blends in with the woods very nicely.{x

14104.name: The drider warrior~
description: It's pretty tough looking.
14104.room_name: {3A Drider {GW{gar{7r{gio{Gr{3 scans the forest for enemies.{x

14105.name: The butterfly~
description: It's barely making any movement in all this rain.

14106.name: The umbrella seller~
description: She's very nice looking, and carries a bunch of umbrellas for the rain.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

14107.name: The merchant~
description: He's pretty old and looks hungry for money.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
14107.room_name: A merchant walks the streets searching for a sale.

14108.name: The bounty hunter~
description: He's pretty tough looking.  You hope you're not the next one on his list.
